rev.comment: Rm graphic; not used in this olympics and fails [[WP:NFCC]] #10c regardless
rev.diff:
Line 1: Line 1:
At the [[1900 Summer Olympics]], a number of [[sailing]] events were contested. The number that are still considered Olympic is debated, though the IOC gives 10<ref name=IOC>See [http://olympic.org/uk/athletes/results/search_r_uk.asp].</ref>. All races were held in [[Ton Classes]] at [[Meulan]], except the ''10-20 ton'' class and the non Olympic ''+20 ton'' class. This both were held off the coast of [[Le Havre]].
At the [[1900 Summer Olympics]], a number of [[sailing]] events were contested. The number that are still considered Olympic is debated, though the IOC gives 10<ref name=IOC>See [http://olympic.org/uk/athletes/results/search_r_uk.asp].</ref>. All races were held in [[Ton Classes]] at [[Meulan]], except the ''10-20 ton'' class and the non Olympic ''+20 ton'' class. This both were held off the coast of [[Le Havre]].
